attributes.action: To reduce diesel fuel cost to the same as petrol fuel at filling stations.
attributes.additional_details: In 2004 diesel and petrol costs were the same price/litre.Recently the price difference had risen to as much as 15p/litre.I would ask the government to evaluate the environmental 'green' issues of this continueing trend with a view to reducing the price of diesel fuel to that of petrol fuel at UK filling stations.
